113.content:
delta was the blue robot abandoned at windy vally and in this alternate existance gamma did not kill him and so he simply waited for eggmans orders and over time the blue paint wore off of his arms and they returned to a iron clad grey color because he had got those arms from beta when beta was upgraded and then one day he recived a message from from from the egg carriers on board computer which read

"chaos has been destroyed.
the egg carrier has been destroyed.
the egg carrier 2 has been destroyed.
project chaos has failed.
all e series robots dismissed"

with that information all deltas loyalty to the seemingly infaleble eggman vanished and he turned his atention to his own survival, without tactical information and supplys from hq he wouldn't normally survive and this would stump a regular robot be he was far to intelligent, he could find a way to survive on his own... surley
113.title: delta

1131.content: delta looked at the situation logicaly to ensure his survival, he would need power to keep operational, weapons to defend himself from the blue demon and other threats, shelter to slow down decay and parts to make repair and maintain himself and as a harmless rhino droid walked by it became too simple, he changed his arms for the origonals which meant he had a hand to adjust things and a machine gun to spare more parts from his kills than the rockets, he simply pulled the trigger and put a bullet in the rhino droids face he took the power cells and attached the jets to his back as flight would be helpful in this environment he also got enough parts to make a quality pair of hands, convertarm attachmets to hand held weapons and a pile of spares.
1131.title: modify himself

11313.content:
certain areas had productive or tactical resources and egg-man new this so he designed the capsual to be a computer/ rescoucre base for certain areas to support foot soldiers delta knew if he could hack the capsual he could control the other simpler robots in the area and get the lions share of any remaining resources and he would have a super computer.

it took him a while to get to the casual but once he did he cut off a side panel and connected with its internal interface, it took him all of two seconds to hack the thing and gain complete control but there was a problem the area he was living in before was defencable and sheltered but had few resources but this area was out in the open but had the capsual
